com.hds.hcpaw.fss.api.conn

Class DelegatingTrustManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hds.hcpaw.fss.api.conn.DelegatingTrustManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.net.ssl.TrustManager, javax.net.ssl.X509TrustManager

    public class DelegatingTrustManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.net.ssl.X509TrustManager
    The TrustManager for the SSLSocketFactorys. This method uses a provided set of TrustManagers from a given KeyStore. If a KeyStore was provided or the trust could not be established by the app's KeyStore, the method checks against the system KeyStores.
